comprehensive_overview: Optuna is an open-source hyperparameter optimization framework to automate hyperparameter search for machine learning algorithms. It can be used with any machine learning framework and optimizes a wide range of models effectively.
core_features:
1. Efficient hyperparameter optimization algorithms such as TPE (Tree-structured Parzen Estimator) and CMA-ES (Covariance Matrix Adaptation Evolution Strategy).
    2. Easy integration with major machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, etc.
    3. Visualization tools for analyzing optimization results and study hyperparameter relationships.
    4. Support for distributed optimization for scaling hyperparameter search.
    5. Ability to define flexible search spaces for hyperparameters.
